com.mesosphere.sdk.offer

Class ResourceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.ResourceUtils

  • public class ResourceUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates common methods for manipulating Resources.

      • setResource

        public static TaskInfo.Builder setResource(TaskInfo.Builder builder,
                                           Resource resource)
                                    throws TaskException
        This method replaces the Resource on the TaskInfo.Builder with the supplied resource, if a resource with that name already exists on that task. If it isn't, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        builder - the task to install the resource on
        resource - the resource to install on the task
        Returns:
        the supplied builder, modified to include the resource
        Throws:
        TaskException

      • getResource

        public static Resource getResource(TaskInfo taskInfo,
                                   java.lang.String resourceName)
        This method gets the Resource with the supplied resourceName from the supplied TaskInfo, throwing an IllegalArgumentException if not found.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo - the task info whose resource will be returned
        resourceName - the resourceName of the resource to return
        Returns:
        the resource with the supplied resourceName

      • getResource

        public static Resource getResource(TaskInfo.Builder taskBuilder,
                                   java.lang.String resourceName)
        This method gets the Resource with the supplied resourceName from the supplied TaskInfo.Builder, throwing an IllegalArgumentException if not found.
        Parameters:
        taskBuilder - the task builder whose resource will be returned
        resourceName - the resourceName of the resource to return
        Returns:
        the resource with the supplied resourceName

      • getResource

        public static Resource getResource(ExecutorInfo executorInfo,
                                   java.lang.String name)

      • getResource

        public static Resource getResource(ExecutorInfo.Builder executorBuilder,
                                   java.lang.String resourceName)
        This method gets the Resource with the supplied resourceName from the supplied ExecutorInfo.Builder, throwing an IllegalArgumentException if not found.
        Parameters:
        executorBuilder - the executor builder whose resource will be returned
        resourceName - the resourceName of the resource to return
        Returns:
        the resource with the supplied resourceName

      • getResourceBuilder

        public static Resource.Builder getResourceBuilder(TaskInfo.Builder taskBuilder,
                                                  Resource resource)
        This method gets the existing Resource.Builder on the TaskInfo.Builder that has the same name as the supplied resource. That resource serves as a default value if no such builder exists on the task builder, and the return value in this case will be a resource builder created from that resource but attached to the task builder.
        Parameters:
        taskBuilder - the task builder to get the resource builder from
        resource - the resource to get the name from or to use as template if no such builder exists on the task
        Returns:
        a resource builder attached to the task builder

      • getResourceBuilder

        public static Resource.Builder getResourceBuilder(ExecutorInfo.Builder executorBuilder,
                                                  Resource resource)
        This method gets the existing Resource.Builder on the ExecutorInfo.Builder that has the same name as the supplied resource. That resource serves as a default value if no such builder exists on the executor builder, and the return value in this case will be a resource builder created from that resource but attached to the executor builder.
        Parameters:
        executorBuilder - the executor builder to get the resource builder from
        resource - the resource to get the name from or to use as template if no such builder exists on the executor
        Returns:
        a resource builder attached to the executor builder
